entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chetwynd
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:26 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.8°C
entry.summary:

Pressure: 103.8 kPa

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 70%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 70 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
